Finally Thursday morning I was freed. Courtesy 498a mine was a conditional bail & every Sun for next 2 months I had to report to Pol Station
It was abt 06:30pm when they handed over my release order to the jailor, but according to the jail rules no one could be released after 6pm.
The courts reopened on Wednesday & my bail petition again came for hearing around 03:30 pm. PP was again missing but some additional PP came
As Monday & Tuesday were also court holidays due to some local festival, I was lucky enough to be govt guest for 5 days in the Central Jail.
The judge told my bail couldn't be granted as she has to listen to PP before passing any judgement and thus I got a lovely weekend present.
My lawyer moved the bail petition and presented few of the documentary evidences. But to my surprise the public prosecutor didn't turn up.
Judge ordered 14days JC. No one listened my side of story and the FIR filed by my bitter half & company was treated as the Gospel of Truth.
Reached AP on Friday early morning. Shocked to find the SI didn't know either English or Hindi. Presented before the judge around 4 pm (Fri)
I contacted local police station but they just made a note in their diary and asked me to carry on with AP police personnel.
Jan-2012: Police comes to my house and forcibly takes me along with them in name of investigation from Bangalore To AP.
